statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-05'
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY date, shift_start_time
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_schedules
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules WHERE employee_id = 1 AND date = '2022-05-01'
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-05'
SELECT * FROM employee_schedules ORDER BY date DESC, shift_start_time ASC
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_schedules WHERE shift_start_time >= '08:00:00'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shifts, SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(shift_end_time, shift_start_time))) AS total_shift_duration FROM employee_schedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_shift_duration > 28800
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE department='IT';
SELECT * FROM shift WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shift ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee WHERE department = 'IT' AND position = 'Developer' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager' AND department IN ('IT', 'HR') ORDER BY department, employee_name;
SELECT * FROM shift WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND end_time <= '2022-01-01 16:00:00' ORDER BY shift_name;
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shift WHERE shift_name LIKE '%Night%' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT date, shift_start_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT shift_id, employee_id, date FROM shift_assignment ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM work_hours GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM work_hours GROUP BY employee_id, date HAVING total_hours_worked > 8;
SELECT employee_id, date, hours_worked FROM work_hours WHERE hours_worked BETWEEN 6 AND 8;
SELECT shift_id, employee_id, date FROM shift_assignment WHERE employee_id=101 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employee WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE shift_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM shift_assignment WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-05-15' AND '2022-05-20';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_id FROM employee ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY shift_date DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_name FROM employee JOIN department ON employee.department_id = department.department_id WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(shift_id) AS shift_count FROM shift_assignment GROUP BY employee_id HAVING shift_count > 3;

SELECT employee_name, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time, department_name FROM employee_schedule JOIN employee ON employee_schedule.employee_id = employee.employee_id JOIN department ON employee.department_id = department.department_id WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, email, phone_number FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT department_name, employee_name FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = department_employees.department_id JOIN employees ON department_employees.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT employee_id, count(*) as shifts_count FROM schedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING count(*) > 2;
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN department_employees de ON e.employee_id = de.employee_id INNER JOIN departments d ON de.department_id = d.department_id;

SELECT s.shift_name, s.start_time, s.end_time, e.employee_name FROM shifts s INNER JOIN schedules sc ON s.shift_id = sc.shift_id INNER JOIN employees e ON sc.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE e.employee_id = 3 AND sc.date = '2022-08-15';
